# Prompts Index

This folder contains one focused prompt per file to help contributors and AI assistants work on the project.

Files

- `implement-jit-backend.prompt.md` — JIT evaluation and minimal harness ✅
- `implement-sandbox.prompt.md` — Landlock/seccomp/cgroups implementation ✅
- `implement-services.prompt.md` — SQLite pool & MailApp ✅
- `web-framework-and-triggers.prompt.md` — Drogon dispatcher & triggers ✅
- `ci-and-reproducible-builds.prompt.md` — CI split and dev image ✅
- `security-audit-and-threat-model.prompt.md` — Security audit checklist ✅
- `ai-assistant-codegen.prompt.md` — AI assistant codegen tasks ✅
- `ai-assistant-tests-refactor.prompt.md` — Tests and refactor tasks ✅
- `ai-assistant-security-checks.prompt.md` — AI assistant security audits ✅

Usage
- Open a prompt, follow the inputs and acceptance criteria, and open a focused PR with tests.

If you want additional prompts (e.g., templates for PR descriptions or issue templates), tell me which area to add next.
